text: illeogalodoe hananim-ui bomul-inaege issda neohuiege malhaji ani hamyeo sumgyeojin geos-eul naega alji moshamyeo naega cheonsala neohuiege malhaji anihago danji naege gyesidoen geos-eul ttaleul ppun-ila illeo galodoe jangnim-i boneunjawa gat-eul su issneunyo geuleonde do neohuineun saeng-gaghaji anhneunyo
